default.tags: funny pets, funny animals, cat, dog, pet comedy, animal fails, cute pets, funny moments

videos.title: Cat vs Laser Pointer: The Ultimate Battle
videos.description: Watch this hilarious cat attempt to catch the uncatchable red dot! Epic fail compilation.

scenes.prompt: Orange tabby cat sitting calmly on a carpet, focused eyes staring at something, indoor home setting, natural lighting, cinematic
scenes.caption: The calm before the chaos...

scenes.prompt: Orange tabby cat suddenly leaping into the air, paws stretched out, trying to catch a red laser dot, mid-jump action shot, cinematic
scenes.caption: ATTACK MODE: ACTIVATED

scenes.prompt: Cat spinning in circles, chasing laser pointer on floor, fast chaotic movement, determined expression, funny moment, cinematic
scenes.caption: The chase begins!

scenes.prompt: Cat crashing into furniture while chasing laser, comedic fail moment, surprised expression, indoor setting, cinematic
scenes.caption: Mission failed successfully

scenes.prompt: Exhausted cat lying on floor panting, defeated but proud expression, laser dot still visible nearby, funny ending, cinematic
scenes.caption: Worth it.

videos.title: Dog vs Mailman: The Daily Drama
videos.description: The epic saga of a dog who thinks he's protecting the world from the mailman. Spoiler: He's not.

scenes.prompt: Golden retriever dog sleeping peacefully on couch, calm and relaxed, cozy home interior, soft lighting, cinematic
scenes.caption: Life is peaceful...

scenes.prompt: Same dog suddenly alert, ears perked up, staring at door intensely, suspicious expression, dramatic lighting, cinematic
scenes.caption: Wait... what's that sound?

scenes.prompt: Dog running full speed toward camera, mouth open, excited and determined expression, motion blur, action shot, cinematic
scenes.caption: INTRUDER ALERT!

scenes.prompt: Dog barking aggressively at front door, jumping up and down, heroic stance, protecting home, dramatic moment, cinematic
scenes.caption: NOT ON MY WATCH!

scenes.prompt: Dog sitting proudly by door wagging tail, satisfied expression, thinks he saved the day, heroic pose, cinematic
scenes.caption: Another day, another victory

videos.title: Cat + Empty Box = Pure Chaos
videos.description: Why do cats love boxes so much? Science can't explain it, but this video captures the obsession perfectly.

scenes.prompt: Gray cat walking past expensive cat bed and toys, ignoring everything, indoor home setting, natural lighting, cinematic
scenes.caption: Ignoring $100 cat tower...

scenes.prompt: Cat suddenly stopping and staring at small cardboard box on floor, eyes wide with interest, dramatic moment, cinematic
scenes.caption: But THIS... this is perfection

scenes.prompt: Cat attempting to squeeze into tiny box, body half in half out, struggling but determined, funny moment, cinematic
scenes.caption: If I fits, I sits!

scenes.prompt: Cat fully compressed inside tiny box, only head sticking out, proud satisfied expression, comedic image, cinematic
scenes.caption: Nailed it.

scenes.prompt: Cat still in box refusing to leave, other toys scattered around ignored, stubborn cat logic, funny ending, cinematic
scenes.caption: Box life chose me.

videos.title: Dog's Epic Bath Escape Plan
videos.description: Watch this clever dog attempt the greatest prison break of all time. Spoiler: It's just bath time.

scenes.prompt: Fluffy dog being carried toward bathroom, suspicious worried expression, trying to resist, comedic moment, cinematic
scenes.caption: Wait... where are we going?

scenes.prompt: Dog seeing bathtub filled with water, eyes widening in horror, backing away slowly, dramatic reaction, cinematic
scenes.caption: OH NO. NOT THE BATH.

scenes.prompt: Dog attempting to escape by hiding under bed, only tail visible sticking out, failed hiding attempt, funny, cinematic
scenes.caption: If I can't see them, they can't see me

scenes.prompt: Wet soapy dog sitting in bathtub looking betrayed and defeated, sad puppy eyes, dramatic lighting, cinematic
scenes.caption: Betrayed by my own family

scenes.prompt: Fluffy clean dog zooming around house at full speed, shaking water everywhere, chaotic energy, funny ending, cinematic
scenes.caption: FREEDOM ZOOMIES!

videos.title: Cat Discovers Gravity (Again)
videos.description: A scientific documentary about a cat testing the laws of physics... by knocking everything off the table.

scenes.prompt: Black and white cat sitting on table next to cup, staring at human innocently, calm expression, cinematic
scenes.caption: Just sitting here, being innocent...

scenes.prompt: Cat looking at cup, then at human, then back at cup, calculating expression, mischievous moment, cinematic
scenes.caption: Hmmm... interesting object

scenes.prompt: Cat slowly extending paw toward cup, testing it, dramatic slow motion moment, cinematic lighting, comedic tension
scenes.caption: Science requires experimentation

scenes.prompt: Cat pushing cup off table while maintaining eye contact with human, rebellious expression, item falling, cinematic
scenes.caption: Gravity works. Experiment successful.

scenes.prompt: Cat sitting satisfied next to empty table edge, proud expression, multiple items on floor below, victory pose, cinematic
scenes.caption: My work here is done.

videos.title: Dog's Stealth Mission: Operation Kitchen Raid
videos.description: One dog. One mission. One piece of chicken. Zero stealth skills.

scenes.prompt: Beagle dog peeking around kitchen corner, spy-like suspicious look, stealth mode activated, cinematic lighting
scenes.caption: Mission: Impossible theme plays

scenes.prompt: Dog tiptoeing across kitchen floor, exaggerated careful steps, trying to be quiet, comedic stealth attempt, cinematic
scenes.caption: Stealth level: 0

scenes.prompt: Dog standing on hind legs reaching for food on counter, stretching as far as possible, determined expression, cinematic
scenes.caption: So close...

scenes.prompt: Dog losing balance and falling, knocking over items, crashing sound implied, comedic fail moment, cinematic
scenes.caption: ABORT MISSION!

scenes.prompt: Dog sitting innocently on floor pretending nothing happened, guilty expression, food still on counter, cinematic
scenes.caption: I've been sitting here the whole time
